subject: Re: Transfering my recorded session to my computer
author: psfponies
full_text:
Thanks Margaret

Walked in Radio Shack and grabbed both the cable and adapter. They 
fit perfect. Can't wait to see how my session comes out when I clean 
them up a bit.

I recorded two sessions the second one the reception was so bad I 
didn't get much I could hear. I seem to have an Australian spirit 
named "Steve" on my first recorded session he said his name in a  
Australian accent and on the second session he said "gidday".

Kay


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "itcdeadpeople" <ITCdeadpeople@...> 
wrote:
>

> > Hi Kay.  You'll get the same patch cable AND an adapter (1/8 
female to 3/32 male, I 
> think, 
> > double check).  That's what I have to use on my Panasonic DR60, 
since the ear jack on 
> that is 
> > smaller.
> > 
> > Margaret

the 
> > > micro cassette recorder with me. The mic hole in the recorder 
is way 
> > > smaller then the one that goes into the pc. The recorder is a 
Radio 
> > > Shack recorder so hopefully they will have one. 
> > > 
> > > Kay
